posts.post_content:
1.Griffith SGC60--Looks Much Nicer-------------$2500
3.F W Foster Spotted Tie-Worn with some minor faults but will grade---$1500
4.Barnes-Manager St Paul-Very sharp photo, nice card----------$850
5.Fulmer & Tucker-BALTIMORE--Very nice two player card-------------$1200
6.Hornung-NY (scarce 1890 team change)-Pinhole top center, otherwise nice for 1890 card------------$2500
7.Fessenden umpire-Nice image some corner wear---------------$800
10.Connie Mack-Perfect picture EXCEPT position and team next to name neatly scratched out. Slight amount of scrapbook paper on back-------$1750
11.Billy Sunday Nice photo, corner wear, slight paper loss on back---$750



A FEW SGC HIGH GRADE CARDS --SCANS NOW AVAILABLE
1. SGC 84s: McGeachy, Fullmer, Carroll--$1400 each
2. SGC 80s: Duffe, Freeman--$800 each
3. SGC 70s: Sommers, Vinton, Bierbauer--$500 each

NOTE: For a list of all players available, by team, drop me an email.



There are many, many more cards available. If you are looking for specific teams or players I can probably help(don't ask for rarities-they ain't here). Cards of many HOFers are also available. Most of these have condition issues but this reduces the prices, and the photos are generally nice. Scans are available.
Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks---Jay

Hi Jay,

email sent on item 1

Best Regards,
Craig

Could I please get a scan of the Hoy card?  [url]scottg@accessmfgsys.com[/url].
Thanks,
Scott.
Scott-Scan sent.

Though quite a few of the individual cards listed above are gone there are still over 250 cards from various teams available. Many of these are players and teams not often seen. If you have a particular card you are looking for send me an email at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks--Jay

email sent - also, can I get a scan of the Sanders?

Jay....I need a Kelly Louisville Manager card.....I've heard they're easy to find.  And a cabinet of Browning......if you could just check when you get time.....

Tom--I had a Browning cabinet, but one of the boxes I sent out had a tear in the bottom so I put the Browning in to reinforce it. No big deal; it wasn't worth much anyway. Which Kelly-mgr do you want-the portrait or the full body shot; I have both.
Jay- I have an Anson bat at ready that I want to sell or trade. Do you need it?
I need that one. All I can ever find are those darn Anson in Uniforms
I'm glad that Jay is a good sport as we are kind of interfering with his sale....but he is playing too.:)

Does that mean I shouldn't ask for a Frank Grant (Buffalo) card?
:D

Rob-I have a nice Horner-New Haven that is $850. If you want a scan please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]. I don't check here that often so please send the email.

Thanks--Jay

Bump for some price reductions
Do you have any Jimmy Ryan's?
Bump. Just picked up a nice Nash portrait and a Maroon

AK11-I have a Jimmy Ryan (pose 396-1) that has some writing and a name HS on the back, a small green ink "X" in the LR corner, but otherwise nice image. That card is $250. I have a Brouthers with a light image (pose 43-1) and a light pencil identification number on the back. That card is $650. If you want to contact me please email me directly at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks--Jay
Several new cards added(Williamson & Hahm, Cushman-Toledo, Scheibeck, Sterling). If you are a team collector I may have something you need (except you Louisville guys-LOL)
